body: Hi, I was trying to do a simple simulation but the energyplus engine does not generate the total thermal loads. Can anyone help me to find the problem? Attached is the grasshopper file.[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/NxE20jujyI9kT01dGKSHo6UZ12gPBLry4iDG*0f8BytljepbEpKxQdSGix5eIrIIEZu4T4KWZuEpRG9Kizcsl7MgLJj0z5kq/111.JPG)Regards Zuhaib
topic: Energyplus simulation does not generate total thermal loads

replies.body:
Sheikh,
You probably need to enable a couple more of simulation outputs in the HB_EPOutput (for instance zoneHVACParams_).
-A.

Hi Abraham, I have enabled many simulation outputs. Still the problem exists... Please have a look on the grasshopper file. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/NxE20jujyI8oO0ucbxoaG5q5mK7qFxhipufq3yckHZlajAFnoE682fpbmofkuaHOHjQTiUJ84vPIcviQoA-xXjOH5XN9J9v-/22.JPG)

Attached a working version.

Just updated (no need to, though).

The main issue was that you set the isConditioned_ at the HB_Mass2Zone to False.

-A.

Thanks a lot Abraham. Appreciate your help :)

Zuhaib
